alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 2:38AM EST until December 27 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, locally up to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southeastern St. Lawrence and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The band of lake effect is expected to gradually shift south of the St. Lawrence County line late this morning. Locally heavy snow will continue to produce very low visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
